summary: A young man, broke and jobless, abducts three rich college kids to try and get money from their fathers.
cast: Kevin Zegers|Victor Garber|Laura Vandervoort|Devon Bostick|Dustin Milligan|Tatiana Maslany|Stephen McHattie|Ray Liotta|John Bregar|Anthony Ulc|Nola Augustson|Jim Codrington|Martin Doyle|Rosalba Martinni|Eric Fink|Claire Calarco|Jim Calarco
title: El rescate
